original_text: The month Abib is a special month for you. In this month, you must eat a meal to remember the Passover. Remember what the Lord your God did for you. In that month, he brought you out of Egypt during the night.
korean_text: 아빕월을 지켜 네 하나님 여호와께 유월절을 행하라 이는 아빕월에 네 하나님 여호와께서 밤에 너를 애굽에서 인도하여 내셨음이라

sentences.original_text: The month Abib is a special month for you
you must eat a meal to remember the Passover
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 유월절을 기념하여 식사를 해야 한다

sentences.original_text: Remember what the Lord your God did for you
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 하나님 여호와가 너를 위해 행하신 것을 기억하라

sentences.original_text: he brought you out of Egypt during the night
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 밤에 너희를 애굽에서 인도해 냈다
